channel.title: Recent posts to Some other simple example
channel.description: Recent posts to Some other simple example

item.title: Some other simple example
item.description:
Unfortunately none of the example programs compile. Also, I think 05_compress_alone.c and 07_decompress_alone.c aren't useful additions to the examples collection. They basically do the same thing (or a little less) as their originals but in the .lzma format.

Having a good example with excellent comments for buffer encoding/decoding would be useful, but 06_compress_buffer.c doesn't compile, has bugs bigger than simple syntax errors, has identitation issues (mixed tabs and spaces), and doesn't have good tutorial-like comments. So unfortunately this isn't useful either.
item.dc:creator: Lasse Collin

item.title: Some other simple example
item.description:
Hi, I found the task "More tutorial programs are needed for liblzma" in TODO file.
And, I modified the examples (01_compress_easy.c, 02_decompress.c) to get some other examples (stream_alone encode/decode and buffer encode).

The examples is shown in the attachements.
item.dc:creator: Bruce Stark
